EmailTemplate.name: Global_Event_Lean+Leaders_Backers_2016.Denver (Attended) with opening slides
EmailTemplate.subject: Thank You for Attending the Leader’s Guide Workshop!
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Thanks for attending the Leader’s Guide to Adopting Lean Startup at Scale <[[http://pivotal.io/event/lean-workshops/backers]]> workshop for Kickstarter Backers. We’re thrilled to be delivering this workshop series in partnership with Eric Ries and hope you found the experience valuable.
As promised, the workshop materials are available online:
- Presentation <[[https://drive.google.com/file/d/0B7IxBOTTIF-EaXdqWnlDSnQwcDRDODVLR0pqeGpqM0RMNkVj/view?usp=sharing]]> & Opener <[[https://docs.google.com/presentation/d/1j3x_VTDLCCJwHKPsp99QZYp2vXPQsbmOTWky102W5do/edit?usp=sharing]]> - Handouts <[[https://drive.google.com/file/d/0B7IxBOTTIF-EX0pPbWY2OG51Ui12NGdzSWlJNnBhR19rQ2xr/view?usp=sharing]]>
As we kick off this new workshop series, we are counting on your thoughtful feedback. Please complete a quick survey <[[https://docs.google.com/a/pivotal.io/forms/d/16jBmjf1ExbmsCdguHq7cCIWVALifsXApu_s1ud93n7M/viewform]]> to let us know what worked, where we can improve, and what you’d like to see as we move forward.
Share your thoughts <[[https://docs.google.com/a/pivotal.io/forms/d/16jBmjf1ExbmsCdguHq7cCIWVALifsXApu_s1ud93n7M/viewform]]>
Want more?
- If you’re not already part of the Leader’s Guide network, sign up now <[[https://theleadersguide.org/]]>. - Interested in learning more about how Pivotal can work with you? Learn more <[[http://pivotal.io/labs]]>.
We look forward to seeing you at future events!
Best, Michele Perras Sr Director of Strategy Pivotal Labs
